events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will be reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Software Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage your application and will keep you updated throughout the process.
The initial screening call was successfully completed, and your technical background aligns well with our teamâ€™s needs.
Thank you for your quick response confirming your availability for the next interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM. Please prepare accordingly.
The technical interview went well, and the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2:00 PM to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and all questions regarding company policies and expectations were addressed.
We are pleased to propose a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including details about compensation and start date.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to systems, team introductions, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process is now complete. We are thrilled to have you joining the engineering team and look forward to your contributions.
